globalusage-for:
Title of [[Special:GlobalUsage]]
* $1 - name of the searched file, with namespace
globalusage-no-results:
Used for empty result on [[Special:GlobalUsage]]
* $1 - name of the file (with namespace)
globalusage-on-wiki:
Shown in the list of global usages.

Example: [[Commons:Special:GlobalUsage/Example.jpg]] and [[Commons:File:Example.jpg]]

Parameters:
* $1 - (Unused) the filename
* $2 - the project name given as a domain, e.g. en.wikipedia.org
globalusage-of-file:
Used on an image page.

The number of following wikis is unknown. By an empty result, no message is shown.
globalusage-more:
Used on an image page, when more global usage results are available. Example: [[Commons:File:Example.jpg]]
* $1 - name of the file (without namespace)
